basestation.vision

Class VisionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • basestation.vision.VisionManager

  • public class VisionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Collects input from multiple vision systems and exposes a unified vision API across the systems. Vision is relatively under-tested and may be issue-prone/ in need of redesign.

    • Method Detail

      • addVisionSystem

        public int addVisionSystem(VisionSystem vs)
        Adds vs to be tracked by the VisionManager. Assumes vs is already calibrated to the canonicalVisionSystem
        Parameters:
        vs - The visionSystem to begin tracking
        Returns:
        the counter id of vs

      • getAllVisionMappings

        public java.util.Set<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.Integer,VisionSystem>> getAllVisionMappings()
        Returns:
        All entries of VisionSystems with their associated ids

      • getAllLocationData

        public java.util.List<VisionObject> getAllLocationData()
        Returns a list of vision objects with vision ids. Coordinates are made canonical.
        Returns:
        A list of all VisionObjects tracked across all VisionSystems, relative to the Canonical system

      • getBotCoordinate

        public VisionCoordinate getBotCoordinate(Bot bot)
        Gets the location of a bot relative to the BaseStation's interpretation or null if no such coordinate exists
        Parameters:
        bot - The bot being looked up
        Returns:
        A vision coordinate or null

      • getVisionSystemById

        public VisionSystem getVisionSystemById(int visionSystemId)
        Parameters:
        visionSystemId - the int associated with the desired VisionSystem
        Returns:
        the vision system associated with visionSystemId or null if none exists
